title: Banana/zh-CN
data:
**NetHack 中文 Wiki 需要您的帮助！**  
[了解如何帮助我们完善Wiki](/wiki/NetHackWiki:How_to_help/zh-CN "NetHackWiki:How to help/zh-CN")

**[English](/wiki/Banana "Banana")**

 • [한국어](/wiki/Banana/ko "Banana/ko")

 • [中文（中国大陆）‎]()

| % [![Banana.png](/images/6/69/Banana.png)](/wiki/File:Banana.png) |                                                                                                        |
| ----------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ |
| 名称                                                                | 香蕉                                                                                                     |
| 基础价                                                               | 9 [zm](/wiki/%E9%87%91%E5%B8%81 "金币")                                                                  |
| 营养值                                                               | [80](/index.php?title=%E8%90%A5%E5%85%BB%E5%80%BC\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "营养值 (page does not exist)") |
| 食用所需回合数                                                           | 1                                                                                                      |
| 重量                                                                | [2](/index.php?title=%E9%87%8D%E9%87%8F\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "重量 (page does not exist)")            |
| 行为                                                                | [绝对素食](/index.php?title=%E8%A1%8C%E4%B8%BA\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "行为 (page does not exist)")         |

**香蕉**（banana）是[NetHack](/index.php?title=NetHack/zh-CN\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "NetHack/zh-CN (page does not exist)")中的一种[可食用品](/wiki/%E5%8F%AF%E9%A3%9F%E7%94%A8%E5%93%81 "可食用品")。它适合于[绝对素食](/index.php?title=%E7%BB%9D%E5%AF%B9%E7%B4%A0%E9%A3%9F\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "绝对素食 (page does not exist)")行为。

[ ]

## Contents

- [1 生成](#.E7.94.9F.E6.88.90)

- [2 描述](#.E6.8F.8F.E8.BF.B0)

- [3 历史](#.E5.8E.86.E5.8F.B2)

- [4 Variants](#Variants)

  - [4.1 SLASH'EM](#SLASH.27EM)
  - [4.2 UnNetHack](#UnNetHack)
  - [4.3 dNetHack](#dNetHack)
  - [4.4 SlashTHEM](#SlashTHEM)
  - [4.5 Hack'EM](#Hack.27EM)

- [5 百科文本](#.E7.99.BE.E7.A7.91.E6.96.87.E6.9C.AC)

- [6 引用及注释](#.E5.BC.95.E7.94.A8.E5.8F.8A.E6.B3.A8.E9.87.8A)

## 生成

[游客](/index.php?title=%E6%B8%B8%E5%AE%A2\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "游客 (page does not exist)")在游戏开始时获得的随机食物中有可能出现香蕉[\[1\]](#cite_note-1)。

用脚[踢](/index.php?title=%E8%B8%A2\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "踢 (page does not exist)")[树](/index.php?title=%E6%A0%91\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "树 (page does not exist)")有14⁄15的概率生成(8-[rnl](/index.php?title=Rnl/zh-CN\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "Rnl/zh-CN (page does not exist)")(7))个香蕉，每棵树限一次[\[2\]](#cite_note-2)。砍倒一棵树有1⁄5的概率掉落一个水果，其有可能是香蕉[\[3\]](#cite_note-3)。如果树木被[掘洞怪物](/index.php?title=%E6%8E%98%E6%B4%9E%E6%80%AA%E7%89%A9\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "掘洞怪物 (page does not exist)")破坏，它有1⁄3的概率生成一个随机水果，其有可能是香蕉[\[4\]](#cite_note-4)。

[使用](/index.php?title=%E4%BD%BF%E7%94%A8\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "使用 (page does not exist)")有[充能](/index.php?title=%E5%85%85%E8%83%BD\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "充能 (page does not exist)")的[丰饶之角](/index.php?title=%E4%B8%B0%E9%A5%B6%E4%B9%8B%E8%A7%92\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "丰饶之角 (page does not exist)")有0.9%的概率生成1～2个香蕉[\[5\]](#cite_note-5)。

## 描述

[食用](/wiki/%E9%A3%9F%E7%94%A8 "食用")香蕉会获得80营养值。香蕉可以用于驯服[草食类](/index.php?title=%E8%8D%89%E9%A3%9F%E7%B1%BB\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "草食类 (page does not exist)")的[家畜](/index.php?title=%E5%AE%B6%E7%95%9C\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "家畜 (page does not exist)")[怪物](/index.php?title=%E6%80%AA%E7%89%A9\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "怪物 (page does not exist)")。

除家畜外，[猿](/index.php?title=%E7%8C%BF\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "猿 (page does not exist)")和[猴子](/index.php?title=%E7%8C%B4%E5%AD%90\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "猴子 (page does not exist)")也可以用香蕉[驯服](/index.php?title=%E9%A9%AF%E6%9C%8D\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "驯服 (page does not exist)")。猿、猴子和[北美野人](/index.php?title=%E5%8C%97%E7%BE%8E%E9%87%8E%E4%BA%BA\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "北美野人 (page does not exist)")在成为玩家的宠物后，会将香蕉视作[招待物](/index.php?title=%E6%8B%9B%E5%BE%85%E7%89%A9\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "招待物 (page does not exist)")[\[6\]](#cite_note-6)[\[7\]](#cite_note-7)。

## 历史

香蕉最初于[Jay Fenlason's Hack](/wiki/Jay_Fenlason%27s_Hack "Jay Fenlason's Hack")的衍生作品Hack 1.21和Hack for PDP-11里出现，在[Hack 1.0](/wiki/Hack_1.0 "Hack 1.0")中是首批加入游戏的物品之一。

## Variants

**此条目或段落的部分内容需要翻译。**  
您可以帮助我们[**翻译此页面**](https://nethackwiki.com/index.php?title=Banana/zh-CN\&action=edit)，但**请勿使用机器翻译**。

### SLASH'EM

In [SLASH'EM](/wiki/SLASH%27EM "SLASH'EM"), all [apelike creatures](/wiki/Apelike_creature "Apelike creature") can be tamed with thrown bananas.

### UnNetHack

In [UnNetHack](/wiki/UnNetHack "UnNetHack"), the Pacman [random vault](/wiki/Random_vault_\(UnNetHack\) "Random vault (UnNetHack)") has a guaranteed banana at a random position.

### dNetHack

In [dNetHack](/wiki/DNetHack "DNetHack"), [notdNetHack](/wiki/NotdNetHack "NotdNetHack") and [notnotdNetHack](/wiki/NotnotdNetHack "NotnotdNetHack"), [Pirates](/wiki/Pirate "Pirate") start the game with 3-6 bananas; [incantifier](/wiki/Incantifier "Incantifier") Pirates have their bananas replaced with scrolls of [food detection](/wiki/Scroll_of_food_detection "Scroll of food detection"). [Clockwork automata](/wiki/Clockwork_Automaton_\(starting_race\) "Clockwork Automaton (starting race)") characters in roles that would start with bananas are instead given potions of [oil](/wiki/Potion_of_oil "Potion of oil").

### SlashTHEM

In [SlashTHEM](/wiki/SlashTHEM "SlashTHEM"), Pirates start the game with 3-6 bananas as in dNetHack, and incantifier Pirates receive scrolls of food detection instead.

### Hack'EM

In [Hack'EM](/wiki/Hack%27EM "Hack'EM"), Pirates start the game with 3-6 bananas as in dNetHack.

## 百科文本

He took another step and she cocked her right wrist in  
viciously. She heard the spring click. Weight slapped into  
her hand.  
"Here!" she shrieked hysterically, and brought her arm up in  
a hard sweep, meaning to gut him, leaving him to blunder  
around the room with his intestines hanging out in steaming  
loops. Instead he roared laughter, hands on his hips,  
flaming face cocked back, squeezing and contorting with great  
good humor.  
"Oh, my dear!" he cried, and went off into another gale of  
laughter.  
She looked stupidly down at her hand. It held a firm yellow  
banana with a blue and white Chiquita sticker on it. She  
dropped it, horrified, to the carpet, where it became a  
sickly yellow grin, miming Flagg's own.  
"You'll tell," he whispered. "Oh yes indeed you will."  
And Dayna knew he was right.

\[ The Stand, by Stephen King ]

## 引用及注释

1. [↑](#cite_ref-1) [src/u\_init.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 144](https://github.com/NetHack/NetHack/blob/NetHack-3.6.7_Released/src/u_init.c#L144)
2. [↑](#cite_ref-2) [src/dokick.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 1115](https://github.com/NetHack/NetHack/blob/NetHack-3.6.7_Released/src/dokick.c#L1115)
3. [↑](#cite_ref-3) [src/dig.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 398](https://github.com/NetHack/NetHack/blob/NetHack-3.6.7_Released/src/dig.c#L398)
4. [↑](#cite_ref-4) [src/dig.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 1321](https://github.com/NetHack/NetHack/blob/NetHack-3.6.7_Released/src/dig.c#L1321)
5. [↑](#cite_ref-5) [src/mkobj.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 2219](https://github.com/NetHack/NetHack/blob/NetHack-3.6.7_Released/src/mkobj.c#L2219)
6. [↑](#cite_ref-6) [src/mondata.h in NetHack 3.6.7, line 232](https://github.com/NetHack/NetHack/blob/NetHack-3.6.7_Released/src/mondata.h#L232)
7. [↑](#cite_ref-7) [src/dog.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 826](https://github.com/NetHack/NetHack/blob/NetHack-3.6.7_Released/src/dog.c#L826)

[![此条目的内容已同步至NetHack 3.6.7。详细信息请点击此处。](/images/f/f7/Nh367-icon.png)](/wiki/NetHackWiki:Next_version "此条目的内容已同步至NetHack 3.6.7。详细信息请点击此处。")

Banana/zh-CN

From NetHackWiki
< Banana
Jump to navigation Jump to search

NetHack 中文 Wiki 需要您的帮助！
了解如何帮助我们完善Wiki

English

 • 한국어

 • 中文（中国大陆）‎
%
名称 香蕉
基础价 9 zm
营养值 80
食用所需回合数 1
重量 2
行为 绝对素食

香蕉（banana）是NetHack中的一种可食用品。它适合于绝对素食行为。

Contents

  • 1 生成
  • 2 描述
  • 3 历史
  • 4 Variants
    • 4.1 SLASH'EM
    • 4.2 UnNetHack
    • 4.3 dNetHack
    • 4.4 SlashTHEM
    • 4.5 Hack'EM
  • 5 百科文本
  • 6 引用及注释

生成

游客在游戏开始时获得的随机食物中有可能出现香蕉[1]。

用脚踢树有14⁄15的概率生成(8-rnl(7))个香蕉，每棵树限一次[2]。砍倒一棵树有1⁄5的概率掉落一个水果，其有可能是香蕉[3]。如果树木被掘洞怪物破坏，它有1⁄3的概率生成一个随机水果，其有可能是香蕉[4]。

使用有充能的丰饶之角有0.9%的概率生成1～2个香蕉[5]。

描述

食用香蕉会获得80营养值。香蕉可以用于驯服草食类的家畜怪物。

除家畜外，猿和猴子也可以用香蕉驯服。猿、猴子和北美野人在成为玩家的宠物后，会将香蕉视作招待物[6][7]。

历史

香蕉最初于Jay Fenlason's Hack的衍生作品Hack 1.21和Hack for PDP-11里出现，在Hack 1.0中是首批加入游戏的物品之一。

Variants

此条目或段落的部分内容需要翻译。
您可以帮助我们翻译此页面，但请勿使用机器翻译。

SLASH'EM

In SLASH'EM, all apelike creatures can be tamed with thrown bananas.

UnNetHack

In UnNetHack, the Pacman random vault has a guaranteed banana at a random position.

dNetHack

In dNetHack, notdNetHack and notnotdNetHack, Pirates start the game with 3-6 bananas; incantifier Pirates have their bananas replaced with scrolls of food detection. Clockwork automata characters in roles that would start with bananas are instead given potions of oil.

SlashTHEM

In SlashTHEM, Pirates start the game with 3-6 bananas as in dNetHack, and incantifier Pirates receive scrolls of food detection instead.

Hack'EM

In Hack'EM, Pirates start the game with 3-6 bananas as in dNetHack.

百科文本

He took another step and she cocked her right wrist in
viciously. She heard the spring click. Weight slapped into
her hand.
"Here!" she shrieked hysterically, and brought her arm up in
a hard sweep, meaning to gut him, leaving him to blunder
around the room with his intestines hanging out in steaming
loops. Instead he roared laughter, hands on his hips,
flaming face cocked back, squeezing and contorting with great
good humor.
"Oh, my dear!" he cried, and went off into another gale of
laughter.
She looked stupidly down at her hand. It held a firm yellow
banana with a blue and white Chiquita sticker on it. She
dropped it, horrified, to the carpet, where it became a
sickly yellow grin, miming Flagg's own.
"You'll tell," he whispered. "Oh yes indeed you will."
And Dayna knew he was right.

[ The Stand, by Stephen King ]

引用及注释

  1. ↑ src/u_init.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 144
  2. ↑ src/dokick.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 1115
  3. ↑ src/dig.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 398
  4. ↑ src/dig.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 1321
  5. ↑ src/mkobj.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 2219
  6. ↑ src/mondata.h in NetHack 3.6.7, line 232
  7. ↑ src/dog.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 826

{{languages}}
{{comestible/zh-CN
  |color=yellow
  |tile=[[image:banana.png]]

  |conduct=绝对素食
}}
'''香蕉'''（banana）是{{cnlink|NetHack}}中的一种[[可食用品]]。它适合于[[绝对素食]]行为。

== 生成 ==
[[游客]]在游戏开始时获得的随机食物中有可能出现香蕉{{refsrc|src/u_init.c|144|nethack=3.6.7}}。

用脚[[踢]][[树]]有{{frac|14|15}}的概率生成(8-{{cnlink|rnl}}(7))个香蕉，每棵树限一次{{refsrc|src/dokick.c|1115|nethack=3.6.7}}。砍倒一棵树有{{frac|5}}的概率掉落一个水果，其有可能是香蕉{{refsrc|src/dig.c|398|nethack=3.6.7}}。如果树木被[[掘洞怪物]]破坏，它有{{frac|3}}的概率生成一个随机水果，其有可能是香蕉{{refsrc|src/dig.c|1321|nethack=3.6.7}}。

[[使用]]有[[充能]]的[[丰饶之角]]有0.9%的概率生成1{{波浪线}}2个香蕉{{refsrc|src/mkobj.c|2219|version=NetHack 3.6.7}}。

== 描述 ==
[[食用]]香蕉会获得80营养值。香蕉可以用于驯服[[草食类]]的[[家畜]][[怪物]]。

除家畜外，[[猿]]和[[猴子]]也可以用香蕉[[驯服]]。猿、猴子和[[北美野人]]在成为玩家的宠物后，会将香蕉视作[[招待物]]{{refsrc|src/mondata.h|232|nethack=3.6.7}}{{refsrc|src/dog.c|826|nethack=3.6.7}}。

== 历史 ==
香蕉最初于[[Jay Fenlason's Hack]]的衍生作品Hack 1.21和Hack for PDP-11里出现，在[[Hack 1.0]]中是首批加入游戏的物品之一。

==Variants==
{{translation/zh-CN|n}}
===SLASH'EM===
In [[SLASH'EM]], all [[apelike creature]]s can be tamed with thrown bananas.

===UnNetHack===
In [[UnNetHack]], the Pacman [[Random vault (UnNetHack)|random vault]] has a guaranteed banana at a random position.

===dNetHack===
In [[dNetHack]], [[notdNetHack]] and [[notnotdNetHack]], [[Pirate]]s start the game with 3-6 bananas; [[incantifier]] Pirates have their bananas replaced with scrolls of {{? of|food detection}}. [[Clockwork Automaton (starting race)|Clockwork automata]] characters in roles that would start with bananas are instead given potions of {{! of|oil}}.

===SlashTHEM===
In [[SlashTHEM]], Pirates start the game with 3-6 bananas as in dNetHack, and incantifier Pirates receive scrolls of food detection instead.

===Hack'EM===
In [[Hack'EM]], Pirates start the game with 3-6 bananas as in dNetHack.

== 百科文本 ==
{{encyclopedia|
He took another step and she cocked her right wrist in
viciously.  She heard the spring click.  Weight slapped into
her hand.
"Here!" she shrieked hysterically, and brought her arm up in
a hard sweep, meaning to gut him, leaving him to blunder
around the room with his intestines hanging out in steaming
loops.  Instead he roared laughter, hands on his hips,
flaming face cocked back, squeezing and contorting with great
good humor.
"Oh, my dear!" he cried, and went off into another gale of
laughter.
She looked stupidly down at her hand.  It held a firm yellow
banana with a blue and white Chiquita sticker on it.  She
dropped it, horrified, to the carpet, where it became a
sickly yellow grin, miming Flagg's own.
"You'll tell," he whispered.  "Oh yes indeed you will."
And Dayna knew he was right.
|[ The Stand, by Stephen King ]
}}
